analyzed: dka' thub rnams ni mngon par 'phel phyir nags nang du //
translated: In order to increase austerities,

original: de bas rab tu zhi ba'i gnas ni bdag gis brten //
analyzed: de bas rab tu zhi ba'i gnas ni bdag gis brten //
translated: I will therefore rely on a place of complete peace.

original: de ltar bdag nyid chen po des bsams nas khyim na gnas pa yongs su dor te /
analyzed: de ltar bdag nyid chen po des bsams nas khyim na gnas pa yongs su dor te /
translated: Having thought in this way, the great being gave up living in the home.

original: chu g-yo ba med cing 'bab pa 'gram gyi shing me tog skyes pa rnams kyis nye bar mdzes pa /
analyzed: chu g-yo ba med cing 'bab pa 'gram gyi shing me tog skyes pa rnams kyis nye bar mdzes pa /
translated: The river was not moving, but was beautiful with flowers growing on the banks.

original: bstan bcos rnams la goms pas dri ma dang bral ba'i shes rab dang 'dra ba'i chu bos brgyan par byas pa'i sa 'dzin gyi phyogs gcig na /
analyzed: bstan bcos rnams la goms pas dri ma dang bral ba'i shes rab dang 'dra ba'i chu bos brgyan par byas pa'i sa 'dzin gyi phyogs gcig na /
translated: It was adorned with a river that was like the wisdom free of stains, which is familiar with the treatises.üîΩIn a place on one side of the mountain, in a forest of lotus flowers, there were flocks of deer that were delightful with their breath, and with their teeth cutting the green grass.

original: ri dags kyi tshogs dbugs 'byung ba'i so rnams kyis rtsva sngon po gcod pas yid dga' bas padmo'i nags kyi tshogs na ngang pa dang / ngang skya dang / ngur ba rnams kyis nye bar mdzes pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i shin tu che ba nags kyi nang 'ga' zhig @143b na ;
analyzed: ri dags kyi tshogs dbugs 'byung ba'i so rnams kyis rtsva sngon po gcod pas yid dga' bas padmo'i nags kyi tshogs na ngang pa dang / ngang skya dang / ngur ba rnams kyis nye bar mdzes pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i shin tu che ba nags kyi nang 'ga' zhig @143b na ;
translated: The yogis were very happy there. It was a very large forest that was beautiful with geese, swans, and ducks.

original: khri snyan sa le'i pags pas brang gi mthil 'dres par byas pa'i gnas kyi khyad par thob pa /
analyzed: khri snyan sa le'i pags pas brang gi mthil 'dres par byas pa'i gnas kyi khyad par thob pa /
translated: He obtained a special place where the skin of a black antelope was spread on the chest.

original: kun nas dga' ba dang 'dra ba changs pa'i dpal gyis 'khyud par bya ba'i gzugs can chog shes pa /
analyzed: kun nas dga' ba dang 'dra ba changs pa'i dpal gyis 'khyud par bya ba'i gzugs can chog shes pa /
translated: He is like a lover, embraced by the glory of the moon.üîΩHe is like a statue, for he is made of wood.

original: gzugs dang ldan pa dang 'dra bar shing 'ga' zhig la brten nas rnal 'byor dang yid 'brel pas dka' thub bya ba'i phyir brtsams te /
analyzed: gzugs dang ldan pa dang 'dra bar shing 'ga' zhig la brten nas rnal 'byor dang yid 'brel pas dka' thub bya ba'i phyir brtsams te /
translated: He is like a yogi, for he is connected with the mind.

original: bsam gtan la ni rtse gcig yid ldan dbang pos rnam rgyal ba //
analyzed: bsam gtan la ni rtse gcig yid ldan dbang pos rnam rgyal ba //
translated: He is like a conqueror, for he is victorious over the senses.üîΩHe is like a happy man, for he is content with what he has.

original: chog shes rnyed pas bde ba snying rje dang ni ldan pa dang // rgya chen blo ldan gnyis skyes des ni gang zhig brten pa ni //
analyzed: chog shes rnyed pas bde ba snying rje dang ni ldan pa dang // rgya chen blo ldan gnyis skyes des ni gang zhig brten pa ni //
translated: He is like a compassionate man, for he is full of compassion.üîΩHe is like a man of great understanding, for he is the son of a great king.

original: shing des shing nyid don ni byas pa dga' bzhin 'dod par 'gyur ;
analyzed: shing des shing nyid don ni byas pa dga' bzhin 'dod par 'gyur ;
translated: He is like a man who desires, for he is desirous of the good.

original: / rtsva yi gding ba bting byas nas //üîΩsna yi rtse mor mig brtan pas //
analyzed: / rtsva yi gding ba bting byas nas // sna yi rtse mor mig brtan pas //
translated: He is like a man who has spread out a mat of grass,

original: bsgom pa rnams kyi mchog des ni //
analyzed: bsgom pa rnams kyi mchog des ni //
translated: for he is firm in his meditation.üîΩHe is like a man who has attained the highest meditation,

original: bsgom bya rtse gcig yid 'dzin 'gyur //üîΩbrtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa'i lam //
analyzed: bsgom bya rtse gcig yid 'dzin 'gyur // brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa'i lam //
translated: for he is one-pointed in his meditation.üîΩHe is like a man who has attained the perfection of diligence,

original: bzhon pa nyer bsags ngal ba ni //
analyzed: bzhon pa nyer bsags ngal ba ni //
translated: for he is a man who has attained the perfection of diligence.

original: bsam gtan pha rol phyin bstan pa //
analyzed: bsam gtan pha rol phyin bstan pa //
translated: The perfection of meditation is taught.

original: de nas de ni ngal sos gyur //üîΩ'dod pa dge ba rnams dang ni //
analyzed: de nas de ni ngal sos gyur // 'dod pa dge ba rnams dang ni //
translated: Then he rested.üîΩHe abided in the virtuous desires

original: chos rnams la ni so sor gnas //
analyzed: chos rnams la ni so sor gnas //
translated: and in the individual dharmas.
